title: AEP Hygiene Operation Request
description: AEP Hygiene operation request that instructs AEP to deletes or modify records in the specified dataset and sandbox

xdm:batchTime.title: Time the batch was created
xdm:batchTime.description: Time the hygiene batch was created

xdm:operationType.title: Name of the hygiene operation to be applied by downstream consumers
xdm:operationType.description: Name of the hygiene operation to be applied by downstream consumers.

xdm:targetDatasetId.title: Target Dataset ID specified by the user to apply hygiene operations
xdm:targetDatasetId.description: May be "*", but only if operationType = "identityDelete". Otherwise a valid value is required.

xdm:operation.title: Payload of the hygiene op request
xdm:operation.description: Contents of this payload provides identities to delete, or records to update

xdm:identityDelete.title: Specifies rows to delete for matching identities
xdm:identityDelete.description: Specifies rows to delete for matching identities

xdm:namespace.title: The identity namespace
xdm:namespace.description: The namespace associated with the `xid` attribute.

xdm:changes.title: Subset of the record to update
xdm:changes.description: Subset of the record to update
